description:
“No way! I`m on the Miracle Train?” Noriko takes the stations by surprise with her excited outburst. Self-proclaimed train fanatic Noriko is overjoyed to find herself on the legendary Miracle Train after getting on at Shiodome station. Closet train maniac Shiodome tries to be helpful by talking to Noriko about trains, but she cannot keep up with him, leading Noriko to reveal her plan to get her revenge on her train fanatic classmate.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 恋の0哩標識(マイル・マーカー・ゼロ)
